results.name: Number T(n,k) of permutations of [n] with exactly k distinct lengths of increasing runs; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=A003056(n), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..60, flattened
maple: b:= proc(u, o, t, s) option remember;
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..degree(p)))(b(n, 0$2, {})):
mathematica: b[u_, o_, t_, s_] := b[u, o, t, s] = If[u + o == 0, x^(Length[s ~Union~  {t}] - 1), Sum[b[u - j, o + j - 1, 1, s ~Union~ {t}], {j, 1, u}] + Sum[b[u + j - 1, o - j, t + 1, s], {j, 1, o}]];
T[n_] := With[{p = b[n, 0, 0, {}]}, Table[Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 0, Exponent[p, x]}]];
T /@ Range[0, 16] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 27 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
